name: create_lead_in_marketo_create_lead_in_marketo
title: Create Leads in Marketo Create
description: This template illustrates how B2C companies can use Okta Workflows to sync customers to Marketo. Using this template ensures that every new user that signs in to your website has a profile in Marketo. This enables you to avoid manual and error-prone imports and immediately engage with new users through marketing campaigns to increase engagement and retention.
